  • 6233 Truman Dr

6233 Truman Dr

Description

This lovely home features modern amenities and stylish finishes, including hardwood floors, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. The open floor plan creates a welcoming atmosphere that's perfect for hosting gatherings with friends and family. Relax in the comfort of the large master suite, complete with a luxurious ensuite bathroom. The backyard is perfect for outdoor entertaining, with a spacious patio and lush landscaping. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a beautiful home that's built to last.

$87 000 purchase price

Payment details

Monthly Payment of $1,834 is based on sales price of $170,900, plus sales tax, title fee, and estimated closing costs, and includes site rent of $568 per month. Assumes a 10% down payment, a loan term of 300 months, and 7.99% interest per annum (APR of 8.08%). Payment does not include insurance escrow or monthly lawn maintenance fee, so payment may be greater. Subject to credit approval and background screening. Not valid with any other offer. Offer expires June 30, 2023. MHG Group NMLS #1123019. Equal Housing Lender.
